name: Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates
text: §412:6-304  Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates.  No savings bank shall make any loan or extension of credit in violation of section 18(j) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, 12 U.S.C. §1828(j). [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
